Security you can trust

Enterprise-grade security to protect your team and customer data

Encrypted Data

All data encrypted in transit and at rest with industry-standard protocols.

Role-Based Access

Granular permissions to control who can view and edit technician profiles.

GDPR/CCPA Ready

Compliant with major data privacy regulations out of the box.

Secure Links

Time-limited, trackable profile links with optional access controls.

Regular Security Audits

We conduct regular third-party security audits and penetration testing to ensure your data stays protected. SOC 2 Type II certification in progress.
